
----- Starting a game -----
ttt-ask <name>: Asks user <name> to join a game. Note: will be denied if other player has a pending request.
ttt-accept    : Accepts a request from player to start a new game
ttt-deny      : Denies a request to play a game with a player
ttt-pool-join : Joins the pool of users wanting to play a game
ttt-pool-play : Plays a random player in the pool

----- Playing a game -----
ttt-board     : Displays current board moves
ttt-move <loc>: Makes move to location <loc>
ttt-quit      : forfeits a game
